subject: Soccer
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The American midfielder DaMarcus Beasley wants to leave Glasgow Rangers if he cannot get a regular place in the starting lineup. Beasley, who joined the Scottish Premier League team in 2007, has been used sparingly this season and has not played since Rangers beat Hamilton, 7-1, on Dec. 6. ¶The Red Bulls traded midfielder/forward Mike Magee, 24, to Los Angeles Wednesday for a second-round pick in Thursday’s M.L.S. draft in St. Louis. magee (NYT)¶Wayne Rooney scored and limped off with a hamstring injury in the first six minutes of Manchester United’s 1-0 victory over Wigan Athletic in a match that lifted the defending champions into second place in the English Premier League. After scoring, Rooney was forced off with the injury to his leg about five minutes later. He could miss three weeks, Manchester United Manager Alex Ferguson said. United (13-2-5) is 2 points behind Liverpool (13-1-7) with one game in hand. manu.
